```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
site_phenometrics_data <- read_csv(here("data","site_phenometrics_data.csv"))
```

```{r filter California observations only}
ca_pheno <- site_phenometrics_data %>%
  filter(State == "CA")
```
